Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can accurately draw a string telephone that connects two students with clear attention to detail, showing how it can be used to communicate over a distance.
The student can clearly depict the use of sound to send and receive messages, perhaps using visual cues like sound waves or communicating actions.
The student can illustrate that the string telephone uses basic materials such as cups and string, correctly representing their role in the device.
The student can effectively represent that communication is occurring from one student to another over a distance, possibly using directional cues or expressions to show the exchange.
The student can convey how this simple device solves the problem of communicating over long distances without the need for modern technology, either through the context or setting in the drawing.
CANNOT: The student may occasionally leave some minor elements unlabeled or less detailed such as the specific length of the string or the exact positioning of each student.
